edu.ufl.cise.mathbox

Class MathBoxActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • edu.ufl.cise.mathbox.MathBoxActivity

  • public class MathBoxActivity
extends Activity
    The main activity which displays main UI and implements gesture listener and touch listeners. Gesture are passed to a Recognizer class for recognition.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  MathBoxActivity.DrawerItemClickListener
      Drawer item click listener which called on touch of any item in drawer list

      • onCreate

        private void showTutorialAlertDialog(java.lang.String title,
                           java.lang.String msg)
        Method to show an alert box given title and message to display
        Parameters:
        title - title of the dialog box
        msg - message to display

      • onStop

        protected void onStop()
        Android Activity's onStop() method overridden to save preference of showing tutorial on lauch

      • onCreateOptionsMenu

        public boolean onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu menu)
        This method inflates menu on launch

      • prepareImage

        private void prepareImage()
        A method to create an image on sd-card when user presses share button

      • onOptionsItemSelected

        public boolean onOptionsItemSelected(MenuItem item)
        Default method that gets called when an item from the menu is selected. On selection corresponding methods are called

      • selectItem

        private void selectItem(int position)
        Handling of selected drawer item is done in this function.
        Parameters:
        position - the index which was selected

      • setTitle

        public void setTitle(java.lang.CharSequence title)

      • onPostCreate

        protected void onPostCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
        When using the ActionBarDrawerToggle, you must call it during onPostCreate() and onConfigurationChanged()...

      • onConfigurationChanged

        public void onConfigurationChanged(Configuration newConfig)

      • onGesturePerformed

        public void onGesturePerformed(GestureOverlayView overlay,
                      Gesture gesture)
        Any gesture performed on gesture overlay will call this function. predictions given by android system is passed to the Recognizer class.

      • onTouch

        public boolean onTouch(View v,
              MotionEvent event)
        Any button touch events will be processed in this function. 3 buttons are included: 1. Backspace, 2. Evaluate, 3. Clear screen

      • handlePrediction

        private void handlePrediction(java.lang.String predicted)
        Recognizer class gives a prediction and this method handles all the cases based on the prediction.
        Parameters:
        predicted - predicted symbol given by recognizer

      • evaluateExpression

        private void evaluateExpression()
        A method to evaluate expression when user uses evaluate gesture/button,
